attributes.action: make all UK MEPs' voting records publicly and easily available before the June 2009 elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is currently (as far as I can see) impossible to find any information about MEPs' votes. In fact some votes are not even recorded (issues are voted through by a show of hands!). MEP Marco Cappato recently passed a resolution to publicise MEPs' attendance rates but not their actual votes, and it's hard to see how we can claim to be properly informed voters without this information.
